```{webr-r}
mod <- lm(mpg ~ drat, data = mtcars)
summary(mod)
```

---

## How?

- Run `quarto add coatless/quarto-webr` from terminal
- Add to yaml front matter:  
```
filters:
  - webr
```
- Use `{web-r}` chunk:  
````
```{webr-r}
2 + 2
```
````
- Info here: https://github.com/coatless/quarto-webr
